languages.text: "You did the right thing by executing your former comrade."

languages.text: 「君がかつての仲間を処刑したのは、正しい判断だった」
languages.original_text: "You did the right thing by executing your former comrade."

traits.locale_text: 「君がかつての仲間を処刑したのは、正しい判断だった」

languages.text: "Es war richtig von Euch, Euren früheren Kameraden hinzurichten."
languages.original_text: "You did the right thing by executing your former comrade."

traits.locale_text: "Es war richtig von Euch, Euren früheren Kameraden hinzurichten."

languages.text: « Vous avez pris la bonne décision en exécutant votre ancien camarade. »
languages.original_text: "You did the right thing by executing your former comrade."

traits.locale_text: « Vous avez pris la bonne décision en exécutant votre ancien camarade. »

languages.text: «Ejecutar a su antiguo camarada fue la decisión correcta».
languages.original_text: "You did the right thing by executing your former comrade."

traits.locale_text: «Ejecutar a su antiguo camarada fue la decisión correcta».

languages.text: “你处决了曾经的战友，你做得没错。”
languages.original_text: "You did the right thing by executing your former comrade."

traits.locale_text: “你处决了曾经的战友，你做得没错。”

languages.text: "Eski yoldaşını infaz ederek doğru olanı yaptın."
languages.original_text: "You did the right thing by executing your former comrade."

traits.locale_text: "Eski yoldaşını infaz ederek doğru olanı yaptın."
